definition: cloud track (trace of ionizing particle in cloud chamber)

sentences.english: Honeycomb style module of drift chambers produced for tracking high energy particles was described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹用於確定高能粒子徑跡的蜂房狀漂移室組件。

sentences.english: One complete circular track appears in the lower part of the photograph .
sentences.chinese: 照片的下部有一個完整的圓形徑跡。

sentences.english: The algorithm of image segmentation and parameters calculation for overlapping nuclear track image is studied.
sentences.chinese: 本工作研究重疊核徑跡圖像分割和參數統計算法。

sentences.english: After development, the paths of electrically charged particles appeared .
sentences.chinese: 顯影以後，就顯示出帶電粒子的徑跡來。
